author: xtqqczze
body:
Work toward #13915.

Changes touch public APIs but do not cause any overload resolution changes, so in theory are non-breaking:
* https://blog.paranoidcoding.com/2019/03/27/readonly-struct-breaking-change.html
* https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/in-parameter-modifier#:~:text=The%20in%2C%20ref%2C%20and%20out%20keywords%20are%20not,The%20following%20code%2C%20for%20example%2C%20will%20not%20compile%3A

See also: https://github.com/dotnet/coreclr/pull/14789
